info.description: This is the API that serves as the central interaction point between the client and back-end services of Earthdata Pub.
info.title: EarthdataPub

tags.name: notification
tags.description: Interact with the notification system. Send a note, subscribe or unsubscribe to events.

tags.name: action
tags.description: Interact with the action system. Invoke an action, or register a custom action.

tags.name: metrics
tags.description: Retrieve system metrics or submit client side events to be logged.

get.description: Returns a single action by ID
Returns list of actions
Returns a single DAAC by ID
Returns list of DAACs
Returns a single form by ID
Returns list of forms

post.description: Create a new form or update an existing form

get.description: Returns a single group by ID
Returns list of groups
Returns a single role by ID
Returns list of roles
Returns a single note by ID
Returns list of notes
Returns a single question by ID
Returns list of questions

post.description: Create a new question or update an existing question

get.description: Returns a single service by ID
Returns list of services
Returns a single submission by ID
Returns list of submissions
Returns a single user by ID
Returns list of users
Returns a single workflow by ID
Returns list of workflows

post.description: Creates a new workflow or new version of existing workflow

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Name of JSON schema model to retrieve

get.description: Returns a single note by ID

post.description: Send a request to notify an individual or group.

post.summary: Subscribe or unscubscribe to an event
post.description: Subscribe or unsubscribe to events raised by given entities.
Invoke an action to be processed on a given submission.

post.summary: Perform an operation for a Submission
post.description: Perform an operation for a Submission, i.e. initialize, save, submit, review.

get.description: Operation to retrieve metrics for display on dashboard.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start of the time range to view

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End of the time range to view

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Type of events to view, e.g. workflow_transitions, errors, logins

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: True will return a count of events of the given type within the time range, false will return the individual events and their associated data.

post.description: Sends a client-side event to the system to be logged. Typically this would be an error.

get.description: Returns the current API version for compatibility checks.

Action.description: An action that can be invoked by a workflow or externally.

ActionInvokeRequest.description: Request body sent to external action request handler.

ActionRegisterRequest.description: Request body sent to external action invoke handler.

DataRequest.description: Request body sent to data endpoint.

Form.description: A template for a form with a collection of sections containing questions.

Group.description: A group of users with common privileges.

LogEventList.description: A list of events as retrieved from the database.

NotifyRequest.description: Request body sent to external notification request handler.

Permission.description: An individual permission to an entity.

Question.description: A grouping of related inputs to be displayed on a form

Service.description: An external service connected with the EDPUB API.

SubmissionOperationRequest.description: Request body sent to external Submission endpoint.

SubscribeRequest.description: Request body sent to subscribe or unsubscribe to an event.

Version.description: An object containing versioning information of the API.

Workflow.description: A series of steps for processing a Submission

WorkflowActionStep.description: An action step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'action'.

WorkflowCloseStep.description: A close step that signifies the end of a Workflow and a Submission being in a ready state for launching another Workflow. Value for type will always be 'close'.

WorkflowFormStep.description: A form step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'form'.

WorkflowInitStep.description: An init step that serves as an entry point to a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'init'.

WorkflowReviewStep.description: A review step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'review'.

WorkflowServiceStep.description: A service step for constructing a Workflow. Value for type will always be 'service'.
